title: Clase 406
overview: High school is the main setting of Clase 406, the realistic chronicle of a group of young people like many others, who live that bundle of years called adolescence with intensity and carelessness, joy and fear.They study, have fun and, among good friends and bad company, they will learn the difference between dreaming and working to make a dream come true; between demanding attention and earning respect; between promising and committing; between desiring and loving; between being a teenager and being an adult.
